headline: Karine Jean-Pierre to become first Black White House press secretary
sentences:
Vance wins Ohio primary after Donald Trump endorsement
Amy Schumer, abortion rights activists rally to fight for Roe v. Wade
Biden worries overturning Roe would jeopardize 'whole range of rights'
Schumer promises Senate vote on abortion rights after SCOTUS leak
What happens if Roe v. Wade is overturned and abortion outlawed?
Jen Psaki gave a warm introduction to her successor, Karine Jean-Pierre, who will be the first Black and openly gay White House press secretary.
Georgia Grand jury to decide if Trump tried to overturn election
